snippet.title: Final Knight - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Check out chaotic gameplay, fierce monsters, and more from Final Knight in this trailer for the upcoming beat 'em up action RPG, featuring Monster Hunter-style boss battles. Final Knight will be available on Steam and Nintendo Switch. Play Monster Hunter-style action, beat-em-up RPGs, and auto-battlers in Final Knight. Create your party, designate the main player, and configure the party's formation and synergy. Dodge the roars of giant monsters including dragons, stun them, destroy their parts, and craft weapons and gauntlets!
